description: Private Spencer Reed is doing clean up duty at Fort Cox when lieutenant Vince Ferelli walks in. Beefy boys are rare on base and Vince is checking Spencer out. Using his military rank to harass the stud, Vince makes Spencer do push-ups and sit-ups. Vince ties up his innocent victim and sucks his hard cock. Confused, Spencer begs his lieutenant to stop. Vince gets carried away and tries to fuck the helpless stud. Spencer breaks free and gives the bad lieutenant a taste of his own medicine.
title: The Bad Lieutenant
